content: the teddy bear ikea sweater aftonsparv is a cute raglan shaped sweater made to keep your favorite stuffed animal warm and cozy i designed this piece of clothing for the ikea sold aftonsparv but it would fit most plushies with similar measurements the pattern features instructions on how to knit the sweater and a graph for the embroidery using the duplicate stitch method of the ikea logo i designed to fit this tiny sweater happy knitting
